summary: A new female body replacer for skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Welcome and thankyou for downloading CBBE Vanilla_plus by \"betterbecause\"



Description:
============================================================================

Vanilla plus is CBBE body modeled after the Bethesda \"Vanilla\" body for skyrim.
The intention of this mod is to provide a more proportioned and natural looking female body and armor selection
for the game.

Along with the body and armors already available, I have also provided custom Underwear textures. These textures
have been created comlpletely from scratch (with the exception of the sack cloth variant which employs pieces from the 
\"Rough tunic\" textures) to better reflect the rustic and worn atmosphere of the game.

There are currently four options available for \"Never-nude\" support which are:

Chain-mail Light (tan)
Chain-mail Dark  (dark brown)
Sack-cloth Light (faded white)
Sack-cloth Dark  (green)

Currently there is limited Vanilla armor support, I hope to eventually cover every armor in the but for the time being 
I have only covered the basic or \"Common\" armors which are listed below:

Fur      (all four variants)
Iron     (both variants)
Leather  
Imperial (all three variants)
Steel    (both variants)
Forsworn
Hide 
Studded
Ancient Nord

This mod (body and armors) was made using Caliente\'s Bodyslide, and although anyone could replicate these models with minimal 
effort I decided to make these resources available to the community for those lacking either the time, patience or knowledge 
to mess with Bodyslide on there own.

In summation, I hope you enjoy the mod and remember,  If you like it, Endorse it!


Installation:
============================================================================

Body/Armor:
Dowload the body of your choice (nude or never-nude) unzip the the file and copy/paste the contents of the \"Data\" folder
to your Skyrim data directory.

Underwear textures:
Dowload the texture set of your choice (there are four available) unzip the the file, choose either the Hi-res or Lo-Res option and 
copy/paste the contents of the \"Data\" folder to your Skyrim data directory.


Tools Used:
============================================================================

Bodyslide (with custom sliders)
Nifscope
Photoshop
Xnormal


Bugs/Issues:
============================================================================

None that I have found.
If you find any yourself, please report
them to me via PM.


Reccomended Mods:
============================================================================

Caliente\'s Body slide                   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
CaBal120\'s aMidianBorn Book of Silence  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909
BI Phenotypes                           http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31954                


Credits:
============================================================================

Caliente - for bodyslide and underwear models
Stuffed_bunny - for the custom sliders amd plugins 
Bethesda - for a truly awsome game
author: betterbecause
